text: Schalk Willem Hendrik Erasmus (born ) is a South African rugby union player for in the Currie Cup and the Rugby Challenge. His regular position is hooker. He made his Currie Cup debut for Western Province in July 2019, coming on as a replacement hooker in their Round Six match of the 2019 season against . ==References== Category:South African rugby union players Category:Living people Category:1998 births Category:People from Lephalale Local Municipality Category:Rugby union hookers Category:Western Province (rugby team) players Category:South Africa Under-20 international rugby union players Category:Sportspeople from Limpopo
title: Schalk Erasmus
